gui.varodd.reputation: The %s faction is now %s towards you
gui.varodd.sleep.title: Asleep
gui.varodd.sleep.description: You have fallen into a deep slumber
command.varodd.settlement.room.add.usage: /settlement room <ID/name> add <x, y, z> <x, y, z> [function] [name] [NBT]
command.varodd.settlement.room.move.usag: /settlement room <ID/name> move <ID/name> <x, y, z> <x, y, z>
command.varodd.settlement.edit.failed: The data tag did not change: %s
command.varodd.settlement.room.edit.fail: The data tag did not change: %s
command.varodd.faction.reset.failed: Failed to reset reputation of %s with %s
command.varodd.faction.manage.info.name: Name: %s
argument.creature_type.invalid: %s is not a valid creature type
command.varodd.types.list.all.supertypes: Supertypes define the core of a creature, and typically include one or more significant benefits or vulnerabilities
command.varodd.types.list.all.subtypes.d: Subtypes describe smaller details of a creature, often conveying some small benefits, if any
enum.varodd.creature_type.aberration.def: Aberrations are creatures with very unusual physical structures, which might not even adhere to normal physics or biology
enum.varodd.creature_type.air.definition: Air creatures are in tune with the winds, often physically
enum.varodd.creature_type.amphibious.def: Amphibious aquatic creatures are able to survive in water as well as on land
enum.varodd.creature_type.animal.definit: Animals are mundane creatures found roaming the world
enum.varodd.creature_type.aquatic.defini: Aquatic creatures are perfectly capable of surviving underwater, though most cannot survive on land
enum.varodd.creature_type.augmented.defi: Augmented creatures have been altered from their original form or nature, often through magic
enum.varodd.creature_type.cold.definitio: Cold-type creatures are happily at home in frigid environments
enum.varodd.creature_type.construct.defi: Constructs are inanimate matter given mobility and purpose, usually through magical means
enum.varodd.creature_type.dragon.definit: Dragons are reptilian creatures of great power and ability
enum.varodd.creature_type.earth.definiti: Earth creatures are in tune with rocks and earth, often physically
enum.varodd.creature_type.elemental.defi: Elemental creatures are composed in part or in all by manifestations of the natural forces
enum.varodd.creature_type.extraplanar.de: Extraplanar creatures hail from a distant plane of existence, separate from the overworld
enum.varodd.creature_type.evil.definitio: Evil-type creatures are prone to acts of villainy and despotism
enum.varodd.creature_type.fey.definition: Fey are tricksters and deal-makers, often springing from a segment of the natural world containing powerful magic
enum.varodd.creature_type.fire.definitio: Fire-type creatures can endure even the harshest of hot environments
enum.varodd.creature_type.giant.definiti: Giants typically resemble Humanoids, but of a scale far exceeding the norm, and typically lacking much of the intelligence of their smaller kin
enum.varodd.creature_type.goblin.definit: Goblinoids are usually small and mischievous
enum.varodd.creature_type.holy.definitio: Holy-type creatures are noble and benevolent, though they might still pack a whallop if interfered with
enum.varodd.creature_type.humanoid.defin: Humanoids are bipedal creatures, often with a degree of intelligence, typified by players
Magical Beasts are typically animal-like but are often hardier or imbued with magical properties
enum.varodd.creature_type.monstrous_huma: Monstrous Humanoids are typically bipedal creatures with abilities or properties unusual for Humanoids
enum.varodd.creature_type.native.definit: Native creatures are extraplanar creatures (usually Outsiders) encountered in their home realm
enum.varodd.creature_type.ooze.definitio: Oozes are gelatinous and slimey, a primordial thing not quite yet absent from the world
enum.varodd.creature_type.outsider.defin: Outsiders hail from a plane of existence unfamiliar to the common folk
enum.varodd.creature_type.plant.definiti: Plants are a form of natural everyday life imbued with far more energy and consciousness than you'd generally prefer of your salad
enum.varodd.creature_type.reptile.defini: Reptiles are frequently scaley and cold-blooded
enum.varodd.creature_type.shapechanger.d: Shapechangers can typically alter their form in part or in all, and may never be seen with their true appearance
enum.varodd.creature_type.undead.definit: Undead are reflections of what once was amongst the living, but which now shambles around with a different purpose
enum.varodd.creature_type.vermin.definit: Vermin are the natural enemy of the housekeeper and the farmer, such as spiders and rats
enum.varodd.creature_type.water.definiti: Water creatures are in tune with the waves and the sea, often physically
enum.varodd.attitude.hostile.definition: This faction will attack on sight.
enum.varodd.attitude.unfriendly.definiti: This faction may be quick to judge harshly.
enum.varodd.attitude.indifferent.definit: This faction has no strong opinion.
enum.varodd.attitude.helpful.definition: This faction will assist at any opportunity.
